item.title: [PI] 317 Changing rates.. noob friendly
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

So i’ve seen a lot of things asking about how to change rates lately so i am going to tell you how to do it

So what you do is go to your source,src,server. Then you will see a notepad in there called Config.java you will want to search for something like this

public static final int MELEE_EXP_RATE = 1000; // damage * exp rate public static final int RANGE_EXP_RATE = 1000; public static final int MAGIC_EXP_RATE = 1000;
Now you can change the MELEE RANGE AND MAGIC exp rate to whatever you want. Ex: my servers rate is at 1000, that means for every 1 damage you do it will give you 1,000 exp.
Okay now to change the skills rates
You will want to search for Skill Experience Multipliers
Something like this will pop up

public static final int WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE = 1000; public static final int MINING_EXPERIENCE = 1000; public static final int SMITHING_EXPERIENCE = 1500; public static final int FARMING_EXPERIENCE = 500; public static final int FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE = 1500; public static final int HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE = 750; public static final int FISHING_EXPERIENCE = 600; public static final int AGILITY_EXPERIENCE = 500; public static final int PRAYER_EXPERIENCE = 5000; public static final int RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 250; public static final int CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 2500; public static final int THIEVING_EXPERIENCE = 5000; public static final int SLAYER_EXPERIENCE = 200; public static final int COOKING_EXPERIENCE = 1000; public static final int FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE = 750;
Change the numbers after the equal signs to make a skill very easy or very hard…
Hope this guide helps you guys

Read full topic
